trans-unit.source: Specifies the action that occurs when a workflow becomes idle when persistence is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 지 속성이 허용 하는 경우 워크플로가 유휴 상태가 될 때 발생 하는 동작을 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A> function is invoked when the scheduler has no more pending work items and the workflow runtime can persist.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A>스케줄러에 보류 중인 작업 항목이 더 이상 없으며 워크플로 런타임이 지속 될 수 있는 경우 함수가 호출 됩니다.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Idle%2A> function is invoked when persistence is not allowed, and both <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Idle%2A> and <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A> are invoked in that order when persistence is allowed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Idle%2A>지 속성 허용 되지 않는 경우 함수가 호출 됩니다 및 둘 다 <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Idle%2A>및 <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A>지 속성이 허용 하는 경우 해당 순서 대로 호출 됩니다.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Idle%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Idle%2A>

trans-unit.source: None is the default action if no <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A> handler is provided.
trans-unit.target: 되지 않은 경우 기본 작업은 none <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A>처리기가 제공 됩니다.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Specifies that no action is taken.
trans-unit.target: 아무 작업도 사용 되도록 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowApplication"></xref> should persist the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 지정 하는 <xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowApplication"> </xref> 워크플로 지 속하도록 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowApplication"></xref> should persist and unload the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 <xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowApplication"> </xref> 유지 하 고 워크플로 언로드 해야 합니다.
